metadata.name: FAM3 NYC 2022 Genesis Event Token
metadata.description:
FAM3 (Fame) is the intersection of Fashion, Art and Music through the lens of underrepresented creatives within the Web3 community. The mission of this collaborative platform founded by world renown muralist, Andaluz The Artist and  Music Video / Creative Director Dave Nyce, is to inspire and educate young creatives in the BIPOC community that are often overlooked in both Web2 & Web3.

This 3D collectible Genesis Event Token features a digital painting by Andaluz The Artist, which grants access to our FAM3 NYC event on Tuesday June 21st 2022 this Genesis Event Token will unlock exclusive access to The FAM3 Penthouse. This free event will feature panel discussions, an NFT artist gallery, an open margarita bar, and incredible Web3 pioneers performing live.
